nbdev_tut
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## Install

``` sh
pip install nbdev_tut
```

## How to use

We have one func that says hello. See example:

``` python
from nbdev_tut import nbdev_tut
```

``` python
nbdev_tut.say_hello("Michael")
```

    'Hello Michael!'
